email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, around $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. However, the demurrage rate is still on the higher side. Could we negotiate this down to $12,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains October 15-20? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed your counteroffer with the owner. We can agree to a demurrage rate of $12,500 per day, pro rata. The laycan remains unchanged at October 15-20. If this works for you, we can proceed with the fixture. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the flexibility. We accept the revised terms: freight rate of $48.50 per metric ton and demurrage at $12,500 per day. Please confirm the fixture and send over the contract. Looking forward to working with you. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Fixture Confirmed
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! The fixture is confirmed. I’ll send over the contract shortly. The MV Ocean Star will be ready for loading in Houston on October 15. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
